ability.Rock Head: This Pokemon does not receive recoil damage from its recoil moves.
ability.Velocity Surge: When the user's Speed is raised, the user's Attack is raised by 1 stage.

Head Smash.effect: If the user's HP is at 100%, the power is 180 instead of 120. The user takes 25% recoil damage.

Sky Attack.effect: Raises the target's Defense by 1 stage before attacking. Has a 50% chance to make the target flinch if it hits.

Rock Slide.effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
